summary: Provides a compact implementation of the U‑Net architecture, featuring an encoder that progressively downsamples input images with pooling and convolutions, skip connections that merge multi‑scale features, and a decoder that upsamples and refines the combined representations to generate pixel‑wise segmentation outputs.
business_intent: Enables developers and researchers to quickly incorporate a lightweight, configurable segmentation model into medical imaging workflows, reducing development time and computational overhead while maintaining the core benefits of the U‑Net design.
